channel.title: Teleporting help! please!
channel.description: On my Dodian server, you can spam click teleport buttons and get xp extremley fast! How do I make a timer???

item.title: Teleporting help! please!
item.dc:creator: @thel33test thel33test
item.description:
@thel33test wrote:

Ok for that you need to just add a simple thing
go into where ever your case is for the teleport button
it is most likely in ‘clickingmost.java’
and move your addSkillXP underneath “triggertele”
then make sure you have added an action interval
which will make it so once you finish teleporting you will gain the experience then repeats the systen and spam clicking will no longer affect it.

Read full topic
